docblock.long-description: This is my prayer for this project: Dear Lord God the Great I am, I pray unto you in the name of your son Jesus, let your holy spirit guide this prayer as I exhort it through the codes done by your wisdom given to me. Thank you for the guidance you've given us, the wisdom, the patience and the visions you. Thank you for the ideas you've given to me through the whispers of your Holy Spirit. Thank you for the opportunity you've given to me to make this project. Thank you for our company, our bosses and our team mates and office mates and friends. Thank you for our job, our position and all the blessings you give to us through your children. Forgive us for our pride, for our ego, for our boasting and for our self-reliance. Forgive us for not thanking you in every goal met, task completed and bugs fixed. Forgive those that wants to do us harm and those that already did. and please give us the strength to forgive them too. I pray unto you to give us more faith in every thing we do, after every tasks, after every version. Guide us with your Holy Spirit and teach us how to do things great. Let your hands be our hands and let your mind be our mind. Give us wisdom, patience and humility in everything we do. Lord please continue to bless me and continue to use me as a proof your existence, let the wisdom you've given me be light to world, not as an excuse to unbelief. Let this project be fruitful and useful for all who use it. Let there projects be protected from all harm and be useful to there clients. Let every developer who will contribute to this project be blessed and be gifted be wisdom. Give us the peace no one can understand, even on the toughest problem we face. Let every one who is involved on this project be blessed and let everything I prayed for be applied to them as well. All these I pray in the name of your Son, Jesus.

Thank you for our job, our position and all the blessings you give to us through your children. Forgive us for our pride, for our ego, for our boasting and for our self-reliance. Forgive us for not thanking you in every goal met, task completed and bugs fixed. Forgive those that wants to do us harm and those that already did. and please give us the strength to forgive them too. I pray unto you to give us more faith in every thing we do, after every tasks, after every version. Guide us with your Holy Spirit and teach us how to do things great. Let your hands be our hands and let your mind be our mind. Give us wisdom, patience and humility in everything we do. Lord please continue to bless me and continue to use me as a proof your existence, let the wisdom you've given me be light to world, not as an excuse to unbelief. Let this project be fruitful and useful for all who use it. Let there projects be protected from all harm and be useful to there clients. Let every developer who will contribute to this project be blessed and be gifted be wisdom. Give us the peace no one can understand, even on the toughest problem we face. Let every one who is involved on this project be blessed and let everything I prayed for be applied to them as well. All these I pray in the name of your Son, Jesus.
